channel.title: [718/784] - CorruptionX - FULL DUNG/CONS!(ALL SKILLS PERFECTED)!
channel.description:
[CENTER]CorruptionX/Matrix III
World 1: Full 718 hardcore economy World 2: Full 718(plus eoc skin items) spawn World 3: Full easymode economy World 4: EOC Comming in 1-2month max from now!
CorruptionX/Matrix III strives to bring the best service and experience any RSPS can offer! Here at CorruptionX/Matrix III we offer triangle based equality, balanced combat, high-quality updates, a supportive staff team that will cater to your every need.
Visit our Website at [url=http://www.corruptionx.com]www.corruptionx.com[/url] Play Now at [url=http://www.corruptionx.com/play]www.corruptionx.com/play[/url]
CorruptionX was founded over 3 years ago, and started out as a small server. Through the dedication that was shown from the players, CorruptionX became one of the largest and most popular RSPS's to date. Recently, CorruptionX has merged with the developers of Matrix I and Matrix II in hope of creating a better atmosphere and experience for players. A spawn server was set up, then pre-eco PTR(Public Testing Realm) was released, and finally, amidst great anticipation, CXMX Eco was rolled out for the public to play on.
Today, CorruptionX is populated with adventurers who wish to risk their lives fighting off Dragons, defeating Monsters from the 3rd Age, buying and selling goods to make a living, and even peaceful pheasants chopping wood and farming land. CXMX is a very densely populated server with lots of players online at any given time, and the community is friendly and welcoming!
CXMX offers a lot of features that you will never find on another server, coded to perfection, and these include:
Full Dungeoneering(only rsps with it) [url=http://www.youtube.com/embed/YcMyc8IESLU]http://www.youtube.com/embed/YcMyc8IESLU[/url]
Full Construction(even pk honor doesnt have switching house styles) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1EghPomlmDE]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1EghPomlmDE[/url]
Full Stealing creation(only rsps with it) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dpPXzjcXih0]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dpPXzjcXih0[/url]
Full Sawmill minigame(only rsps with it) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QEqOl0tM7dA]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QEqOl0tM7dA[/url]
Social Slayer [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vQt3YvMN8Bc]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vQt3YvMN8Bc[/url]
PvM (Player vs Monster): Nex Corporeal Beast God Wars Dungeon Strykewyrms Kalphite Queen King Black Dragon Queen Black Dragon Tormented Demons Stronghold of Security Revenants Skeletal Wyverms Nomad
Minigames: Fight Caves Flight Kiln Puro-Puro Clan Wars Stealing Creation Dominition Tower Barrows Fight Pits Runespan Sorcerer's Garden
PvP (Player vs Player): Duel Arena Crucible Perfect Combat System Pathfinding Pk Ranks System
Other Features: Full Skilling System Agility Courses Clan Chats Squeal of Fortune Lootshare Lodestone Network Aura's Notes Dramen Tree Spirit Items Kept on Death Gravestones Ancient Curses Profanity Filtering (Optional) Music Player Right Click Report Abuse Normal, Lunar, Ancient Spellbooks
Donator Features: Access to Yell Channel Pet Jad Improved Experience Rates Donator Only Zones
And many more features(but thread has a limit of characters so we cant write them here)!
Click here to start playing today![/CENTER]
As for media... vids are media, sherlock.

CorruptionX was founded over 3 years ago, and started out as a small server. Through the dedication that was shown from the players, CorruptionX became one of the largest and most popular RSPS’s to date. Recently, CorruptionX has merged with the developers of Matrix I and Matrix II in hope of creating a better atmosphere and experience for players. A spawn server was set up, then pre-eco PTR(Public Testing Realm) was released, and finally, amidst great anticipation, CXMX Eco was rolled out for the public to play on.

Today, CorruptionX is populated with adventurers who wish to risk their lives fighting off Dragons, defeating Monsters from the 3rd Age, buying and selling goods to make a living, and even peaceful pheasants chopping wood and farming land. CXMX is a very densely populated server with lots of players online at any given time, and the community is friendly and welcoming!
